Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48622 affecting package gdk-pixbuf2 for versions less than 2.40.0-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-48622 affecting package gdk-pixbuf2 for versions less than 2.40.0-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package gdk-pixbuf2 is earlier than 2.40.0-6, affected by CVE-2022-48622
